From launching at SXSW to reshaping urban mobility, Euwyn shares his journey of scaling a startup, navigating hyper-growth, and what it takes to build and sell a company in today’s market.​​​Where is this?: This event is taking place at a luxe Austin property during SXSW 2025.​​​Who's attending?: A curated list of notable technology founders, investors, and leaders in media and entertainment.​​​Speakers:​Euwyn Poon is a Singapore-born entrepreneur who founded Spin, a shared electric scooter company based in San Francisco that was acquired by Ford in 2018, and is the founding partner of venture capital firm Moso Capital. Poon graduated from Cornell University in 2004 at the age of 18 with a degree in Computer Science and Cornell Law School in 2007.​​​Agenda:​​​​6:30 pm | Doors​​​​6:50 pm | Live podcast recording begins​​​​8:00 pm | Event ends​This session will be led by Seb Webber, Executive Creative Director at Blindspot.​​​We appreciate your patience as Lumos House carefully selects attendees from over 1,000+ RSVPs.​​​About our Hosts & Sponsors:​​​​​Andrew Yeung is the founder of Fibe (a portfolio of events companies including Andrew's Mixers, The Junto Series, and Lumos House). name: AI for Women
content: Explore EventsSign InHosted ByKarishma Patel15 GoingMurphy, Alisha Outridge and 13 othersContact the HostReport EventAIWellnessFeatured in SXSWAI for WomenHosted by Karishma PatelAustinAustin, TexasRegistrationApproval RequiredYour registration is subject to approval by the host.Welcome! To join the event, please register below. Request to JoinYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​Join us for an exclusive morning of panels, networking, and brunch, where we explore how AI is reshaping the women's health landscape.​This event is designed for founders, investors, industry leaders, and professionals in the women’s health space who are interested in how AI can improve health outcomes and drive innovation. Whether you're in femtech, healthcare, AI development, or building a brand that serves women, this gathering will offer invaluable insights and connections.​Why You Should Attend​💡 Explore how AI can transform health outcomes when built thoughtfully🎤 Hear from AI & healthcare experts on real-world applications made for women🤝 Network with like-minded founders & industry leaders🥂 Enjoy brunch, curated discussions, and open networking​Who This Event Is For​Women’s health founders & brand leaders exploring AI integration​AI & tech professionals interested in advancing women’s health​Healthcare executives & decision-makers navigating AI adoption​Investors passionate about supporting women-led businesses or companies that support women​RSVP today to secure your spot! ​Event will be at a venue near Downtown Austin, the exact location will be shared with guests once approved.​​Meet the Hosts​Ema (emaapp.co)​Ema is the first-ever AI assistant tailored specifically for women (and their families)—empowering women with trusted, evidence-based support from menstruation to menopause. Designed to seamlessly integrate into any tech platform, Ema helps health brands, wellness companies, and providers offer personalized health education and guidance to their users.​Willow (onewillow.com)​Willow was founded in 2014 with the belief that mothers deserved better and revolutionized the pumping experience. Willow invented the world’s first fully in-bra wearable pump, allowing moms to breastfeed on their terms - with more flexibility, more freedom, and less compromise.Today, Willow is on a mission to elevate the maternal experience and is combining its medical device DNA with modern technology to address the needs and gaps in maternal care. Visit onewillow.com to learn more.​Meet the Sponsors​How Women Invest​Kubera Venture Capital ​Southern Kindness​Hera BiotechLocationAustinTX, USAHosted ByKarishma Patel15 GoingMurphy, Alisha Outridge and 13 othersContact the HostReport EventAIWellnessWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

name: UKHOUSE @ SXSW - The Future of AI: Who wins, who loses and how do we shape it?
content: Explore EventsSign InHosted ByIsobel WoodJoe Cowen111 GoingNia Pryce, Lida and 109 othersContact the HostReport EventAIFeatured in SXSWUKHOUSE @ SXSW - The Future of AI: Who wins, who loses and how do we shape it?Hosted by Isobel Wood & Joe CowenRegister to See AddressAustin, TexasRegistrationApproval RequiredYour registration is subject to approval by the host.Welcome! To join the event, please register below. Request to JoinYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​Join us at UK House for a deep dive panel exploring money and power in the world of AI.​Investment into AI is projected to hit $600bn by 2027. Just this year Big Tech firms said they would invest $320 billion dollars in AI infrastructure. Governments have also thrown their weight behind AI investment announcements. One of President Trump’s first announcements was support for the $500bn “Stargate” data centre initiative, meanwhile France recently pledged 109bn euros of private investment into AI infrastructure.​There is no question that companies, countries, investors are spending big on AI in the hope of a big pay-off. But significant AI-driven profits remain elusive. ​Our panel will debate whether current AI investments amount to a bubble or are the tip of an iceberg and debate which countries are making the smartest AI plays. This is not just a question about money, it is also about power – who gets to shape the future of AI– governments, tech giants or entirely new players?  ​Join an expert panel of industry leaders, policy architects and AI specialists to explore the critical infrastructure policies and partnerships to build an AI enabled future. This discussion will feature speakers from:​Saumil Shah – VP – Chief of Staff to CEO at Arm​Polina Zvyagina – AI Policy Director at Meta​Austin Carson – Founder/President at SeedAI​William Cutler - Head of Tech Policy - British Consulate San Francisco (UK Government)​Moderated by​B Cavello - Director - Aspen Digital ​Our panel will explore:​Who owns AI’s future? Is this a question of China vs the US or can third countries or regions like the EU carve out a meaningful piece.​AI’s $600 billion dollar question: Are we witnessing an investment bubble? What should the role of governments be?​A global game:  which countries are making the smartest moves-  how should nations work together and what is needed.​This session is essential for innovators, policymakers and big thinkers who want to understand how nations can position themselves for success in the AI revolution- and will be followed by networking with nibbles and drinks.LocationPlease register to see the exact location of this event.Austin, TexasHosted ByIsobel WoodJoe Cowen111 GoingNia Pryce, Lida and 109 othersContact the HostReport EventAIWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

name: WE ARE ARISING GREEN CARPET EVENT
content: Explore EventsSign InPresented byWe Are Arising TourSubscribeEducation, Empowerment, Entertainment. A movement of The Peoples for love, care and respect, solutions, actions, and solidarity for the present and future generations. #WeAreArising a tour coming to a city, reservation, festival, ampitheater, stadium, or pop up festival near you. 2025-2026Hosted ByHeidi LittleRandi Indra’sKristin McMaster *Krissy Lee*5 GoingGenevieve De Coro  and 4 othersContact the HostRefund PolicyReport EventArts & CultureClimateCryptoWellnessFeatured in SXSWWE ARE ARISING GREEN CARPET EVENTWe Are Arising TourIndra's AwarehouseAustin, TexasGet TicketsWelcome! Please choose your desired ticket type:One Workshop + One Concert  1Experience your choice of one workshop, and the main event concert. 11-11 March 11th. VIP Green Carpet Event ​Require Approval 0Get all the benefits of the event with the afterparty included. Experience all you have room for with your choice of workshops, healing experiences, Chef's Are Arising food, and networking, plus the full evenings events, and the afterparty. Photographers on site, and video. Consent to be featured. One Concert Ticket 0Enjoy the evenings activities and experiences from 7-11 PM with We Are Arising Green Carpet Concert Ticket! One Workshop Ticket 0Experience your choice of workshop from 11-5 PM. Chef's Are Arising Meal Ticket 0Enjoy the food of up to 8 of Austin's greatest, conscious Chef's as they cook serve and speak to conscious preparation, cooking, and social emotional learning in the realm of the body, mind,  spirit and energy. Special feature supporting Austin's ASL community with translator and Global Language interpreter Krissy Lee Alliances and Organizations​Require Approval 0Exclusively for our alliances who have tools and solutions for the people. Includes the days events and the concert .Get TicketYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​Join us for a next level kick off event of the We Are Arising Tour! Walk the Green Carpet.​During this years SXSW, feel the NEXT LEVEL! ​"I was at the Arising!" In celebration and solidarity of the power of the people on a shared mission through: music, fashion, tech, finance, food, water, solutions and tools for humanity. We aim to create and explore how we can unite for a sustainable and equitable world during SXSW 2025. ​We have curated a transformative next level event, in safe and brave space for:​ music, art, dance, orators, great leaders, solutions,, panel experiences, and next level networking that celebrates and transforms our experiences for each other as a national and international Community for a common goal of setting right the way we take care of ourselves, families, communities and the world We Are Arising  to a shared mission, and gathering so we can meet and experience each other. ​What solutions, tools, practices, creations are you aware of and working on? We are bringing together the best of the best for a conscious multilevel experience! Music, art, networking, fashion, workshopping opportunities is tech, finance, alternative communities, heart based social emotional learning, experience radical transformational opportunities, and bring your whole self to the SXSW experience. ​Game on! This is going to be the best event during SXSW. We Are Arising! ​https://lu.ma/z8tubmx9​www.wearearising.earth​https://wearearising.earth/we-are-arising-green-carpet...​WE ARE ARISING: A GLOBAL CONVERGENCE OF SOLUTIONS AND TOOL.  FOR THE PEOPLES, SO WE CAN SEE EACH OTHER.  ​ A Movement. A Celebration. A Call to Action. ​Join us for We Are Arising—a transformational gathering designed to inspire, empower, and activate change in every area of our lives and communities. This immersive experience brings together visionary leaders, educators, healers, artists, activists, entrepreneurs, not for profits, organizations and projects for radical well being, and invites all thought leaders to share real solutions for a thriving future.All ages, and all people welcome! ​ WHEN: March 11th,2025 1-10 PM​ WHERE: Indra's Awarehouse Austin, TX​ TICKETS: https://lu.ma/z8tubmx9​The Whole Day We WIll Be Supported from 1-6 PM with beautiful food from Chefs Are Arising: Scottie Love ​The Whole Day Water WIll BE Provided by Perry Weisman ​WORKSHOPS & PANELS​ 1:00 PM | Heart-Based Social Emotional Learning – with Heidi Little, M. Ed (www.seladvancement.org)​ 1:30 PM | The Unbridled Woman – Reclaim your power with Deanne Broggi (www.deannerose.net)​ 2:00 PM | Inspiring Passion, Empowering Change – with Janet Grace (www.janetgrace.love)​ 2:30 PM | Shhh… The Secret to Communication: Breaking Down Barriers – with Marcia​ 3:00 PM | Sustainable FASHION SHOW – Featuring local & international designers showcasing regenerative fashion, leadership, and conscious creativity.​ 3:30 PM | Web 5.0 & The Future of Crypto & Finance – with the We Are Arising Team & Tasedon (https://calltheoperator.wordpress.com)​ 4:00 PM | SOLUTIONS AND TOOLS WE ARE ARISING PANEL: We Are Arising Heidi Little, Krissy Lee, Cerulean, Dov, and Aloysius, Water Consciousness Perry, Food Is Medicine (Moranga, Ibogaine and the plants) Women with Janet Grace, Children Jonathan (Choose Love and Heidi Little), Decentralize the System: Solar Punk, Network States Jorge Cortes Randi Southard (Indras and New Space ID) Community Builders/Sovereign Community In A Box – A plug-and-play off-grid living model for sustainable communities. (Heidi Little, PolyCarp, Aloysius, Various) ​ 4:30 PM | FINANCIAL GAIN: Winning in Today’s Economy – with Shree Chandra (Solana Builder & Finance Expert).​ 5:00 PM | Healing Body, Mind & Spirit – Next Generation You.​ 5:30 PM | ASL With Krissy Lee – Learn American Sign Language and bridge communication gaps.​ 6:15-6:45 PM | Group Meditation, Activation & OMM – A collective prayer & energy transmission for humanities arising. Heidi Little, John Burgess, Tiff Fede, Carol ​ 7:00 PM | SUSTAINABLE FASHION SHOW – Featuring visionary designers, ethical fashion & conscious movement.​ 7;30 PM | WE ARE ARISING CONCERT – A powerful lineup of music from folk to DJ’s to  reggae, Acro Performance, guided activations,  & spoken word activism.​Featuring:​An Opening Transmission We Are Arising​Heidi Little – Soulful, empowering music.​Hawaiian Lyon/John Wayne and BAELIEN​Malaysian MC & Ras Dove Levi – Global hip-hop and roots influence.​DJ Viistik – Spinning electrifying conscious beats.​Ras Dove Levi Rastafarean from the 12 Tribes of Israel ​Aerial & Dance Performance – with Randi Indra.​Activation for freedom with Tangee​The Peace Train is ON with Maryn ​We Are For Everybody Band Reggae mix​Special Guests: Bubba, Tina Michelle, Janet Grace & more.​The Whole Day We WIll Be Supported from 1-6 PM with beautiful food from Chefs Are Arising: Scottie Love ​Water Provided by: Mother Earth and The Awakening Health. Wealth. Sustainability.​ ACTION FOR THE EARTH: SOLUTIONS FOR A SUSTAINABLE FUTURE​ #WATERISLIFE: PROTECT THE SACRED – Water is medicine, water is life.​ The Water Exchange ​ Learn about Water Medicine Wheels – A hands-on workshop to create healing water wheels and restore climate balance.​ Bokashi Love Bombs – Learn how to use microbial technology to clean waterways & restore ecosystems.​ Battery Coin: Green Energy Meets Cryptocurrency – A vision for a regenerative economic system.​ FOOD IS MEDICINE: Nourishing Our Future​   •    How food is sourced, prepared, and delivered impacts global health.​   •    Austin’s top chefs & conscious food leaders will share wisdom on food sovereignty & regenerative nutrition.​ENDING THE OPIOID CRISIS: Cannabis, Herbal Medicine & Natural Remedies​   •    Releasing plants from the controlled substances list to provide access to alternative healing.​   •    How Ibogaine, cannabis, and herbal allies can offer relief from opioid addiction when combined with holistic therapies.​ WOMEN, CHILDREN & THE ELDERLY: PROTECTING OUR FUTURE​ Championing Equality, Justice & Sovereignty​   •    Legal action to protect children globally (www.internationalchildrensmonth.com)​   •    Tools for advocacy & transformation—because sovereignty is a birthright.​   •    Support for youth, women & the elderly in marginalized communities.​ Legal Documents for Systemic Change – Ready-made templates to activate civic legal action and create real transformation.​ GLOBAL IMPACT & THE WE MOVEMENT​Together, we harmonize, collaborate, and drive solutions for a just and sustainable future. WE is endorsed by:​   •    Desmond Tutu, Jane Goodall, Deepak Chopra, Heidi Little, Ralph Nader & more.​   •    Shifting from “I” to “WE” to create a world that works for all.​(www.we.net)​ JOIN US FOR A DAY OF TRANSFORMATION, ACTIVATION & CONNECTION​ Date: March 11th, 2025​ Location: Indra's Awarehouse​Tickets: https://lu.ma/z8tubmx9​TOGETHER, WE RISE.​​The We Are Arising Green Carpet Event is one event of a national tour happening for 2025. Tickets are $100 and includes one workshop of your choice and one concert. You can also purchase just a workshop ticket, just a concert ticket, and a Chef's Are Arising ticket. Or choose the VIP experience and experience it all. NFP and orgs enjoy our custom model to support. Join us for an epic day during this years SXSW at Indra's Awarehouse March 11th 2025. Sponsored by Splendid Alkaline, Omnipresent Media, The Center for Advancement, Indras Awarehouse and more...full details here https://gamma.app/docs/We-Are-Arising-Green-Carpet-Event--bmx51jj0iin2c4mLocationIndra's Awarehouse7904 FM 969, Austin, TX 78724, USAParking is only the lot next to the event space, and the lot across the street. Parking people will be in place. Thank you! Presented byWe Are Arising TourSubscribeEducation, Empowerment, Entertainment. content: Explore EventsSign InPresented byLumos House @ Austin 2025SubscribeAn invite-only event series for the most visionary founders, builders, and leaders in media & tech. As Vice President at Therabody and EAZE, and Director of Artist Partnerships at Pandora, he has led innovative campaigns at the intersection of technology, entertainment, and consumer brands. Now a fractional marketing executive, Matt’s work has generated over 340 million impressions. ​Agenda:​​3:30 pm | Doors​​3:50 pm | Panel begins​​5:00 pm | Event ends​This session will be led by Seb Webber, Executive Creative Director at Blindspot​We appreciate your patience as Lumos House carefully selects attendees from over 1,000+ RSVPs.​About our Hosts & Sponsors:​​​Andrew Yeung is the founder of Fibe (a portfolio of events companies including Andrew's Mixers, The Junto Series, and Lumos House). name: 7BC Global VC Demo Day & VC Fund of Funds launch announcement & Austin Boomtown VC Insight Panel
content: Explore EventsSign InHosted By7BC Venture CapitalAndrew RomansMehron SharqContact the HostReport EventAICryptoFeatured in SXSW7BC Global VC Demo Day & VC Fund of Funds launch announcement & Austin Boomtown VC Insight PanelHosted by 7BC Venture Capital, Andrew Romans & Mehron SharqCBREAustin, TexasGet TicketsWelcome! Please choose your desired ticket type:VC​Require Approval Family Office​Require Approval Pension Fund​Require Approval Foundation​Require Approval IRA / Wealth Manager ​Require Approval Wirehouse Wealth Manager  Endowment​Require Approval Insurance Company LP​Require Approval Multi-Family Office​Require Approval Sovereign Wealth Fund​Require Approval VC Fund of Funds​Require Approval Corporate CVC LP​Require Approval HNWI seeking to become an LP​Require Approval HNWIs must apply and be approved. Email info@7bc.vc to apply.Startup Founder Service Provider 7BC Existing Portfolio Co ​Require Approval 7BC Existing LP​Require Approval Request to JoinYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​​Celebrate the launch of the Global VC Demo Day event circuit and 7BC Capital, our VC Fund of Funds (FoF). Take a break from SXSW and enjoy a networking reception exclusively for VCs and a wide range of LPs that invest in VC funds. We will kick off applications for VCs to pitch at the Global VC Demo Day events for free at our 11 annual VC Demo Day events planned in 8 different cities over the next 12 months. If you are an active VC seeking to raise LP capital or an active LP allocating to the VC asset class, get in touch to be invited to our full-day VC Demo Day events we are hosting throughout the year in San Francisco, Los Angeles, Austin, New York, Miami, London, Dubai, and Singapore: https://www.7bc.vc/events. Send us your deck and info at info@7bc.vc.​​During SXSW we will serve drinks 🍷, bites, and free copies of Andrew Romans’ latest books, Masters of Raising Venture Capital, Masters of Blockchain & Crypto, and Masters of Corporate Venture Capital.​A huge thanks to our sponsors CBRE and Zive AI for supporting this initiative.​Interested in sponsoring or hosting a Global VC Demo Day, VIP dinner, CVC workshop, or VC insight panel + founder event? Contact us at info@7bc.vc to explore partnership opportunities.​​Event Details​​📍 Location: CBRE's Amenity Event Space, 500 W 2nd St, 14th floor, Austin, TX 78701​Agenda​4:00 pm to 8:00 pm: nonstop networking on the terrace with content indoors.​4:00 pm: Registration and networking reception with drinks and bites on the terrace​4:30 pm: Capital Markets Insight Panel, moderated by Timothy Donohue, CBRE ​5:30 pm: Austin Boomtown VC Insight Panel​Alex Moore, Partner, 8VC & 1st employee of PalantirKrishna Srinivasan, Founding Partner at LiveOak VenturesEric Engineer, Partner, S3 VenturesChris Shonk, General Partner, ATX Venture PartnersHan Shen, Founding Partner at iFly.vc Andrew Romans, General Partner, 7BC Venture Capital, Moderator​6:15 pm: 7BC Portfolio showcases​Zive.ai - AustinUmbra.space - AustinDaily.ai - AustinNada.co - Austin Aiden - Dallas ​7:00 pm: Networking reception with drinks and bites​8:00 pm: Event close​​⏰ Time: 4:00 PM – 8:00 PM ​About 7BC Capital and 7BC Venture Capital​​7BC Capital, based in Silicon Valley and Austin, manages an active VC Fund of Funds, investing in a balanced portfolio of pre-seed to growth-stage VC funds. 7BC Venture Capital invests directly in technology companies. Hosting the Global VC Demo Day, 7BC has built an extensive network of active LPs both in Silicon Valley and worldwide. These LPs are deeply committed to helping VCs and founders succeed. 7BC prides itself on delivering value beyond capital by fostering partnerships and empowering VC firms and startups to reach their full potential. Currently investing out of its fourth fund, 7BC is eager to meet the next generation of groundbreaking VCs and startups. 7BC Capital is committed to funding emerging manager VCs that are shattering the performance of the legacy mega funds.​​About CBRE​​With more than 130,000 professionals (including Turner & Townsend employees) in over 100 countries, CBRE is the global leader in commercial real estate services and investment.​About JP Morgan​The Private Bank for Private Equity & Venture Capital Founders, Partners and Firms. Our approach starts within our Private Bank and reaches across the full resources of J.P. Morgan. With us, you have the security of a fortress balance sheet and the expertise of dedicated teams, bringing decades of experience to you and your firm.​About Banc of California​The Venture Banking group offers a broad range of venture debt, fund finance, and treasury and cash management solutions through every stage of growth. Connect with a Venture Banking Specialist:  https://link.edgepilot.com/s/3b7edb61/fDXsW35EiEuQGbYwI4_jVw?u=https://bancofcal.com/lending/venture-banking/​​About Zive AI​​Zive AI revolutionizes fund management for VC managers with its AI-powered platform.​​RSVP Now!​​Don’t miss out on this dynamic evening of networking with active venture capitalists, active Limited Partners, and the 7BC community of LPs and portfolio companies.LocationCBRE500 W 2nd St Suite 1700, Austin, TX 78701, USAHosted By7BC Venture CapitalAndrew RomansMehron SharqContact the HostReport EventAICryptoWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

Join our SXSW community here to stay up to date on all of the events and networking happening during SXSW!​🚨 Entre Pro members will automatically be approved for the event 🚨​​Fidelity Private Shares is committed to supporting the startup & venture capital community. Fidelity helps founders prepare for their next round of funding with our cap table management platform, access to seed stage capital, equity scenario modeling, and premier support to generate, execute & store legal documents. No matter where you are In your journey - from inception to IPO - Fidelity has strategies for you.​Engine is a free travel platform for booking and managing work trips. Designed to save time and money, our global travel network connects businesses to over 750,000 hotels, dozens of airlines, and 40 car rental companies. Access exclusive hotel discounts averaging 26% off public rates. Sign up today and get free access and earn 4% back in Engine Rewards!​Genius Wallet is the easiest way to buy meme coins and invest in crypto. Buy & Sell Memes at Genius today!​TSIB (Turner Surety & Insurance Brokerage, Inc.) is a specialized risk management and insurance consulting firm. Today, our expertise extends to private equity (PE) firms, venture capitalists, and their portfolio companies, as well as high-growth startups across fintech, AI, SaaS, logistics, and real estate investments. We provide comprehensive insurance strategies that protect investments, mitigate operational risks, and ensure compliance with investor mandates. Whether you're a PE firm managing acquisitions and exits, a venture-backed startup navigating hypergrowth, or an executive protecting your leadership team, TSIB delivers tailored risk solutions at every stage—from fundraising and M&A to IPO and beyond. Schedule a free consultation here.​WeWork was founded in 2010 with the vision to create environments where people and companies come together and do their best work. Since then, we’ve become a leading global flexible space provider committed to delivering technology-driven turnkey solutions, flexible spaces, and community experiences.​From two-person startups to public companies, Rho is the banking platform with everything businesses need to manage cash, control spend, and automate finance busywork. Rho offers corporate cards, banking, treasury, expense management, AP, accounting automation, and more in one integrated platform backed by award-winning support.​Rho is a fintech company, not a bank. Checking and card services provided by Webster Bank, N.A., member FDIC; savings account services provided by American Deposit Management, LLC, and its partner banks.LocationPlease register to see the exact location of this event.Austin, TexasPresented byEntreSubscribeEvents for Entrepreneurs and the Tech Community.Hosted ByEntre TeamMichael MarraRyan MyherDrew PartenCharlie StephensIan BerriganKyle CroyleWeWork203 GoingOleksii Avramenko, Nino Karas and 201 othersContact the HostReport EventCryptoWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

name: SXSW She Means Business: Ask Her Anything Hot Seat
content: Explore EventsSign InPresented byNo Pressure NetworkingSubscribeConnecting female investors with founders, fostering collaborations between startups and advisors, & uniting women angel investors with other investing and VC professionals.Hosted ByMaggie Rose MacarNathalia RojasContact the HostReport EventFeatured in SXSWSXSW She Means Business: Ask Her Anything Hot SeatNo Pressure NetworkingRegister to See AddressAustin, TexasRegistration5 Spots RemainingHurry up and register before the event fills up!Approval RequiredYour registration is subject to approval by the host.Welcome! To join the event, please register below. Request to JoinYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​We’re putting top investors from $100M+ funds and founders who’ve raised over $400M in the hot seat one at a time, 10 minutes each to answer your burning questions. No scripts. No filters. Just real talk on raising capital, scaling, and thriving as a woman in business.​Come for the insights, stay for the connections. Expect bold conversations, high-impact networking, and a room full of women who get it.​About Trick Hat Workaway​Trick Hat Workway redefines the way you work, bringing together a dynamic mix of companies and individuals in a space designed for creativity, collaboration, and unconventional thinking—the spirit that makes Austin, Austin. ​Here, coworking isn’t just about desks; it’s about discovery. A place where diverse perspectives intersect, new ideas take shape, and the boundaries between work and life soften. Open to possibility, built for connection, and always in favor of working smarter, not harder.​Naseem Sayani – Investor with How Women Invest | Innovator | Ecosystem BuilderSeasoned venture investor with 20+ years in VC, digital strategy, and business innovation. A frequent panelist and keynote speaker at top tech and investment events, Naseem champions Series A/B female founders building game-changing businesses.​Kelley Arena – Founder, Golden Hour Ventures | Startup Advisor | Angel InvestorFinance expert on a mission to increase funding access for women founders by growing women-led angel investing. Co-leads the Dream Ventures Accelerator and advocates for strategic investing to drive social change.​Kathryn Lancioni – Angel Investor | Advisor | PR ExpertCommunications strategist, award-winning educator, and founder of Presenting Perfection. With 20+ years in media and PR, she coaches professionals and startups on public speaking, branding, and strategic communication. Advisory board member and communications coach for female-founded startups.​Charlotte Ketelaar – Founder, Capwave AI | VC Expert | EntrepreneurA venture capital expert who has raised over $400M+ in Series A+ funding. Now revolutionizing early-stage funding with Capwave AI, Charlotte is on a mission to democratize capital access and empower entrepreneurs.​Ashli Pollard – Founder, Dial Zero Marketing & Cocky VenturesMarketing and business strategist specializing in brand growth, sales innovation, and community-driven marketing. With 11+ years scaling global brands, she helps businesses craft bold, authentic strategies that drive revenue and customer loyalty.LocationPlease register to see the exact location of this event.Austin, TexasPresented byNo Pressure NetworkingSubscribeConnecting female investors with founders, fostering collaborations between startups and advisors, & uniting women angel investors with other investing and VC professionals.Hosted ByMaggie Rose MacarNathalia RojasContact the HostReport EventWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

Request to JoinYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​NachoNacho - The B2B SaaS & AI + Services Marketplace, Hubspot, LendFlow, Deel, Koop AI, and Skrillo, are hosting this exclusive Founder + Investor happy hour event alongside key high-profile brands and VC firms. This networking event will be exclusively for SaaS & AI Founders, C-Suites, investors, tech media, and tech leaders (partnership leaders are definitely welcome, too). This event will include sponsored drinks and appetizers.​This is the seminal event for the tech industry in 2025.​​​At New York Tech Week, we had an amazing turnout with hundreds of participating investors and Founders. You can see photos from our New York Tech Week event here to get an idea of what it was like. We want everyone to have genuine conversations and build real connections here where founders can share their vision, investors can find the next great startup investment opportunity, and media members can get an inside track of the latest deals and tech trends. ​Thanks to our sponsors!​​​Deel: Deel is an HR software that allows businesses to easily expand their workforce globally. With Deel, you can start hiring employees and contractors abroad while they take all the liability and handle compliance matters for you.​LendFlow: Lendflow provides embedded credit infrastructure for fintechs, lenders and software companies to build, embed and launch credit products.​Hubspot: HubSpot develops cloud-based, inbound marketing software that allows businesses to transform the way that they market.​Koop AI: Koop’s trust management platform helps navigate the complexities of regulatory compliance, security reviews, and liability insurance in a single place​Skrillo: Skrillo is a dynamic sales training, mentoring, and consulting organization dedicated to empowering businesses and individuals with the skills and strategies needed to achieve exceptional sales and business development results.If you're interested in sponsoring, please reach out to andy@nachonacho.com.LocationPlease register to see the exact location of this event.Austin, TexasHosted ByAndy KaruzaSanjay GoelJochen TalmonAlan Szternberg Andres MuñozSam ColtJon FryGordon Bowman246 GoingKelsey Kearns, Ari Krzyzek and 244 othersContact the HostReport EventAIWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

name: Batter Up! Austin
content: Explore EventsSign InPresented byHustle Fund EventsSubscribeHosted ByHustle FundContact the HostReport EventFeatured in SXSWBatter Up! AustinHustle Fund EventsRegister to See AddressAustin, TexasRegistrationWelcome! To join the event, please register below. RegisterYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​Let's hang!​​​As a founder, going through the fundraising process can be incredibly frustrating. ​​It takes an amazing amount of time and effort to convince an investor to agree to talk to you.​​​​And then, once you pitch your company, sometimes the investor never gets back to you. ​​Or if they do get back to you, oftentimes their rejection doesn't explain WHY they're not interested.​​​​All this can leave an entrepreneur feeling frustrated, dejected, and unsure of what can be done to improve in the future. ​​We think this stinks.​​​​That's why, on March 11, we're hosting a live pitch event for founders. And it's FREE to attend.​​Here's how it'll work:​RSVP to the event and submit your pitch deck.​​​​Up to 6 founders will be picked and have 2.5 minutes to pitch a panel of investors from Hustle Fund's Angel Squad.​The investors will ask follow-up questions and offer feedback to the founders.... just like in a real VC meeting!​​​​By the end of this event, you'll have a deeper understanding of why investors decide to invest in a company (or not). And the winner takes home a prize  ​​​​We'll leave some time at the end of the event for your questions... so come curious!​Who should come?​We designed this event for founders and investors. ​If you're a founder looking to get feedback on your pitch, you'll love this. If you're a founder just looking to learn from other founders, we invite you to register without submitting your deck, and come enjoy the show! We promise you'll get some big takeaways.​If you're an investor looking to meet more founders, or just hoping to learn more about how to evaluate companies, you'll also get a lot out of Batter Up!​🚨Take Note​This is an in-person event. There is no virtual option. You must be present, in-person, to be eligible to pitch.​Applications to pitch will close on Tuesday, March 4 at 5pm CST. If you have not submitted your deck by then, you will not be able to pitch.​Please be ready with your pitch in case you are selected.​​The Schedule​​​6pm: Get here, eat pizza, make friends​​​6:30-8pm: BatterUp! – Pitches from a few founders and investor panel feedback​​​8-9pm: Finish the pizza, make more friends​9pm: Say goodbye​Who's behind this?​Hustle Fund is an early stage venture firm that believes great founders can look like anyone and come from anywhere. We invest in startups all over the world and we'd love to see what you're building. Learn more about us.​Angel Squad was created by Hustle Fund for you to Learn, Invest and Network! The impact of the Squad is huge - 1500+ Angels, investing over $23M in 65+ companies. At this event in Nashville, you will have the opportunity to attend an IRL pitch event! Learn more about the Squad.​Oracle NetSuite Accelerator has partnered with Hustle Fund to support portfolio companies by making NetSuite accessible to founders through preferred pricing and by providing resources to support their growth. These resources include access to the Oracle network, mentorship, joint marketing, office space across the U.S., programming, functional/strategic support, introductions to our VC partners, and more. Apply online now or email emily.davila@oracle.com.​Amplitude unlocks the power of your products and guides you every step of the way. Our digital analytics platform shows you what your customers love, where they’re getting stuck, and what keeps them coming back. We’ll get you to the core of what they’re thinking, what they’re doing, and why. With Amplitude, you don’t have to write a single line of code or wait weeks for an analyst to write reports. You can confidently solve your product-data problems and make the right investments to drive growth. From Analytics, Experiment, and Session Replay to Guides and Surveys, Amplitude is the only true digital analytics platform.​Let us guide you to where you need to go with the FREE Amplitude for Startups Scholarship Plan. For one year, leverage an industry-best 100 million events a month, along with access to all our growth plan has to offer (Analytics, Experiment, Session Replay, CDP, Warehouse Native, plus Guides and Surveys). Sign-up now!​At Braze, we believe customer engagement is a game-changer for growth. That’s why we launched the Tech for an Equitable Future product grant program, providing eligible founders, including Black and women founders, with 12 months of free access to Braze. With Braze, startups can drive user retention, boost customer lifetime value, and strengthen their brand—ultimately helping grow your customer base and accelerate your business.​Now in its sixth year, the program provides over 25 Black and women-led startups free or discounted access to the Braze platform and supporting services. Last year, we expanded our impact through a new partnership with BET+, offering select participants 1:1 mentorship, a BET+ branding masterclass, free email advertising, and additional growth opportunities.​Learn more about Braze and the Tech for an Equitable Future product grant program here. Submit an inquiry to stay updated, including when applications open in the fall.LocationPlease register to see the exact location of this event.Austin, TexasPresented byHustle Fund EventsSubscribeHosted ByHustle FundContact the HostReport EventWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

content: Explore EventsSign InPresented byLumos House @ Austin 2025SubscribeAn invite-only event series for the most visionary founders, builders, and leaders in media & tech. Please choose your desired ticket type:General​Require Approval VIP​Require Approval Friends of Andrew and Blindspot, please apply here.Request to JoinYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​LUMOS HOUSE PRESENTS:​The Ace Exchange: High-Stakes Poker Night​Where high stakes meet high-impact connections—The Ace Exchange is an invite-only poker night for top founders, investors, creators, and tech leaders. ​What is this?: Part of the invite-only event series, Lumos House, The Ace Exchange is an exclusive poker night that gives you a chance to play the game, build your network, and leave with more than just chips.Where is this?: This event is taking place at a luxe Austin property during SXSW 2025.Who's attending?: A curated list of notable technology founders, investors, and leaders in media and entertainment.*We appreciate your patience as Lumos House carefully selects attendees from over 1,000+ RSVPs.​About our Hosts & Sponsors:​​​Andrew Yeung is the founder of Fibe (a portfolio of events companies including Andrew's Mixers, The Junto Series, and Lumos House). He is also a Partner at Next Wave NYC, a pre-seed/seed found backed by Flybridge Capital. Andrew's hosted 100+ events for 30k+ tech founders and professionals in 8 cities that were featured in Bloomberg, Business Insider, Fast Company, and Fortune Magazine. Business Insider dubbed him the "Gatsby of Silicon Alley."​​​​​​​​Get on the list for future events: Twitter • Instagram • Website​​Blindspot is a platform that helps any advertiser optimize their Digital Out of Home budgets by 60% or more. Over 1.500.000 digital billboards are accessible through Blindspot. The platform is being used by over 25,000 advertisers, from SMBs to startups and household names such as Rihanna, Airbnb, Snoop Dogg, American Airlines, United Nations, Morning Brew, Universal Music, Samsung, TikTok and more. Learn more here.LocationPlease register to see the exact location of this event.Austin, TexasPresented byLumos House @ Austin 2025SubscribeAn invite-only event series for the most visionary founders, builders, and leaders in media & tech. name: Private SXSW Launch: Authentic Texas BBQ Experience for Investors, Founders, and Product Leaders
content: Explore EventsSign InHosted ByPaige Marie CabiancaTeague8 GoingOlivia Lyng, Christian Edwards and 6 othersContact the HostReport EventAIFeatured in SXSWPrivate SXSW Launch: Authentic Texas BBQ Experience for Investors, Founders, and Product LeadersHosted by Paige Marie Cabianca & TeagueAustinAustin, TexasRegistration ClosedThis event is not currently taking registrations. You may contact the host or subscribe to receive updates.About Event​As SXSW takes over Austin, we're offering an exclusive escape for a select group of investors, product leaders, and founders. Join us for an authentic Texan experience away from the downtown hustle for an afternoon.​The afternoon kicks off with a luxurious limo ride, complete with drinks and an opportunity to chat and mingle. Enjoy the 45-minute journey to the heart of Texas BBQ, where we'll indulge in the finest barbecue at the state's top spot. Immerse yourself in the charm of an old Texan town, complete with cowboy hats and rustic vibes, before we head back to the city.​What to Expect​Luxurious Transport: Comfortable limo travel to and from the BBQ location.​Exclusive Networking: Intimate setting with peers in the startup and tech scene. Event capped at only 12 attendees + SubSeq's founders.​Top-Tier BBQ: Dining at what is known as the best BBQ joint in Texas.​Historic Ambiance: Experience the unique culture of an old Texan town.​Celebrating Innovation: This event is proudly hosted and sponsored by SubSeq, an AI-native startup, to celebrate our public launch. Join us as we mark this milestone by connecting and celebrating with fellow visionaries in the tech industry.​Have questions or specific requests? Please don't hesitate to reach out to the hosts.​Note: This exclusive event has limited spots to ensure a quality experience for everyone. If you are an investor, founder, or product leader, we warmly welcome you to join us for this unique gathering. Please request your invitation to participate.​Details and departure point in downtown Austin will be shared after RSVP confirmation.LocationAustinTX, USASpecific departure point in downtown Austin will be shared after RSVP confirmation.Hosted ByPaige Marie CabiancaTeague8 GoingOlivia Lyng, Christian Edwards and 6 othersContact the HostReport EventAIWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

name: Climate Round Up: Innovation Showcase 2025
content: Explore EventsSign InPresented byAustin Climate InnovationSubscribeMonthly meetup in Austin for climate innovators to connect, share ideas, ask for help and offer to help in exchange. Our mission is to make Austin a climate tech hub.Hosted ByJacob BorgesonJeff BlickmanOlivia DellZac PadgettSean VoigtBryan WhiteContact the HostReport EventAIClimateFeatured in SXSWClimate Round Up: Innovation Showcase 2025Austin Climate InnovationRegister to See AddressAustin, TexasRegistrationApproval RequiredYour registration is subject to approval by the host.Welcome! To join the event, please register below. Request to JoinYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​We’re back with the 2025 edition of our annual innovation showcase! Join us to meet the visionary founders and investors shaping our planet’s future and learn about what’s next in climate tech.​Last year’s showcase brought together 200+ startup, investment, non-profit and enterprise leaders and was celebrated as a favorite event. We look to build on that success with high-quality programming and a welcoming community.​We'll have some food from De Nada Cantina next door, some alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, snacks, some live demos to get hands on with, and of course good vibes. ​Getting to Palm Ventures from the Convention Center area is pretty easy via bus or even scooter. It's a 20 minute direct ride on CapMetro route #2  - 7 stops down Cesar Chavez. Buses run every 15 minutes.​There is some parking, but we anticipate it will fill up fast.​TENTATIVE EVENT SCHEDULE​5pm  - Doors Open​Live Product Showcase throughout​Hysun: Hydrogen fuel cell generator​Powerstack: Solar Infrastructure​Funga: Enhanced reforesting​Moment Motors: Classic Cars, electrified​​5:15 - 6:15: Startup Pitches & Showcase​Aalo Atomics​Zero Electric​Inductive Robotics​Pila Energy​Gridsight​6:15 - 7:00 Panel: The Intersection of Big Tech and Climate Tech: Energy, Compute, and Strategy​Lee Bratcher, Founder and President of the Texas Blockchain Council (confirmed)​Chris Hemschot, VP of Colocation at Tenaska​Crusoe Energy​Special Guest!​Break​​7:15- 8:00: Panel: Climate & Energy Policy and Priorities in 2025 and Beyond​Lissie Garvin: Foundation and Fellowship Program Director at 776 Foundation​Greg Gershuny: VP of Energy and Environment Programs at the Aspen Institute Climate​Jason Hochman: Co-founder and Executive Director - Direct Air Capture Coalition​Neil Chatterjee: Former Chair, Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, Chief Govt Affairs Officer, Palmetto​8:00 - 8:45: Connect, engage, relaxLocationPlease register to see the exact location of this event.Austin, TexasPresented byAustin Climate InnovationSubscribeMonthly meetup in Austin for climate innovators to connect, share ideas, ask for help and offer to help in exchange. content: Explore EventsSign InPresented byPanoplaiSubscribeHosted ByPanoplaiGoFastiContact the HostReport EventAIFeatured in SXSWElevate & Unwind Happy HourPanoplaiFogo De Chao - AustinAustin, TexasRegistrationApproval RequiredYour registration is subject to approval by the host.Welcome! To join the event, please register below. Request to JoinYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​Join Panoplai (previously Glimpse) & GoFasti for a fun-filled happy hour event at Fogo De Chao - Austin during SXSW! ​Enjoy an open bar and complimentary hors d’oeuvres in an upscale yet relaxed setting. ​After a jam-packed week at SXSW, this is your perfect opportunity to unwind, connect, and mingle with like-minded industry pros—including leading innovators and trailblazers in the AI and tech space. ​Great drinks, bites, and conversations await—RSVP now and don’t miss out on this unforgettable evening!Exclusive to our Happy Hour! ​We've teamed up with our client, Forward Studio, to help you tackle the big questions around innovating with intention.​How are companies winning—or losing—the battle to stay relevant? Join us as we explore how high-fi and low-fi research, along with co-design methods, empower businesses to build with and for their audiences.​AI may be the hottest topic right now, but innovation often comes down to one thing: how humans feel about the future. Get a glimpse into the present and future of research.​Exclusive to you—unlock the full report at the Happy Hour!​Must be a SXSW badge holder.LocationFogo De Chao - Austin200 Congress Ave., Austin, TX 78701, USAPresented byPanoplaiSubscribeHosted ByPanoplaiGoFastiContact the HostReport EventAIWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

name: 『MELT』150+ Founders x Investors Dynamic Network for SXSW
content: Explore EventsSign InPresented byMELT PresentsSubscribeHighly-selective founders and investors network.Hosted ByKyosuke TogamiStacy LiContact the HostReport EventFeatured in SXSW『MELT』150+ Founders x Investors Dynamic Network for SXSWMELT PresentsRegister to See AddressAustin, TexasRegistrationWelcome! Please choose your desired ticket type:Founder Pass ​Require Approval Approval will be requiredInvestor Pass​Require Approval Approval will be requiredEnterprise Pass​Require Approval Approval will be requiredRequest to JoinYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​South by Southwest, where over 100,000 professionals & artists gather from around the world, we have decided to hold this event at this momentous occasion.​​We're bringing together an exclusive group of around 150 top-tier founders, spanning from pre-seed to Series D, alongside engaged VCs and angel investors.​​​🤝The event is a dynamic 2-hour networking session ​💎 ​​VIP Sponsored by cyber・Fund ​cyber•Fund is a founder-led investment firm accelerating the cybereconomy. We allocate capital to the best startups in distributed AI to ensure a healthy transformation to a cybernetic economy that benefits humanity.​📝　Cyber Fund was among the earliest backers of Ethereum, Polkadot, and Solana.​Previous our event MELT ​​​ 80+ VC and Angel Investors​​​Ai, Fintech, Climate Tech, Gaming, Edtech, Proptech, Web3, AR/VR, Cybersecurity, Insurtech, Retailtech, SaaS, B2C, B2B, and Pre-seed to Series D stages​​​300+ Founders/CEOs​​​3 Series D companies​​​2 Series C companies​​​6 Series B companies​​​35 Series A companies​​​15 Pre-Series A companies​​​106 Seed companies​​​146 Pre-Seed companies​​​26 Bootstrap companies​​​50+ Executives​​8 companies featured in Forbes Under 30, 12 Y Combinator alumni​​​1st MELT event ,  We brought in 1070 registrations from all over the world and carefully selected 300 founders and investors.​​​10% Series A and above (Founders/C-levels)​​​35% Seed (Founders/C-levels)​​​40% Pre-seed (Founders/C-levels)​​​10% Investors​​​Other​​​2nd MELT event, We brought in 420 registrations and carefully selected 170 founders and 30 investors. Most of founders had raised at least $1 million, had revenue of $1-$3 million, or had a previous successful exit.​​​33 Series A and above (Founders/C-levels)​​​133 Seed (Founders/C-levels)​​​112 Pre-seed (Founders/C-levels)​​​58 Investors( Tencent , Netease, Docomo Ventures, other VCs and Angel Investors)​​​Others ​​​​MELT event is organized and operated solely by  MELT (not Yahoo Inc. nor any of its affiliates or brands, including GDC).LocationPlease register to see the exact location of this event.Austin, TexasPresented byMELT PresentsSubscribeHighly-selective founders and investors network.Hosted ByKyosuke TogamiStacy LiContact the HostReport EventWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

name: Your Startup Sucks (SWSW) Pitch Comedy Show
content: Explore EventsSign InHosted ByJulian Jimenez11 GoingNhan Nguyen, Rodrigo Paredes and 9 othersContact the HostReport EventFeatured in SXSWYour Startup Sucks (SWSW) Pitch Comedy ShowHosted by Julian Jimenez2201 Lake Austin BlvdAustin, TexasGet TicketsTicket Price$10.00Welcome! To join the event, please get your ticket below.Get TicketYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​➡️➡️Free entry for founders who sign up to pitch (limited spots) ⬅️⬅️Austin’s premier live pitch startup comedy show is back with Tequila 512! Watch brave and passionate founders pitch their (your) startups 🔗to a panel of seasoned VCs, and former founders for recognition and brutally honest (and hilarious) feedback. Let's be honest, your startup might suck...but you don't have to! Watch high-stakes entertainment in the most raw, authentic format. You could witness the next Steve Jobs own the stage or watch a crazy person bomb in a spectacular display! You never know what's going to happen! So sip on tasty tequila cocktails, eat delicious gumbo, and strap in!​**Open bar and unlimited drinks provided by Tequila 512**​Free entry for founders who sign up to pitch (limited spots) ⬅️⬅️​​Agenda:​Pre-Show Networking (6:30–7:30 PM): Enjoy open bar, mix and mingle. Show starts at 7:30 sharp.​Your Startup Sucks (7:30–9:00 PM): If you know you know. Don't be late.Location2201 Lake Austin BlvdAustin, TX 78703, USAOpen Bar Provided by Tequila 512Hosted ByJulian Jimenez11 GoingNhan Nguyen, Rodrigo Paredes and 9 othersContact the HostReport EventWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

name: Future of Fashion at SXSW: Where Fashion, Tech, and Community Intersect
content: Explore EventsSign InHosted ByREFIND400 GoingDavies Odu, Amanda Crawford and 398 othersContact the HostReport EventArts & CultureFeatured in SXSWFuture of Fashion at SXSW: Where Fashion, Tech, and Community IntersectHosted by REFINDMira Mira VenueAustin, TexasGet TicketsWelcome! Please choose your desired ticket type:Free Entry 12pm-6pm​Require Approval 1PANELS, POP-UPS, ACTIVATIONS, DEMOS, NETWORKINGAvailable until  Early Bird Fashion Show 0FREE DRINKS & Standing Room (21+)Sales ended  Early Bird Fashion Show VIP​7 Left 0FREE DRINKS & Guaranteed Seating (21+)Sales ended  GA Fashion Show 0Standing Room | 21+Available until  VIP Fashion Show 0Gauranteed Seating | Free Drinks | 21+Available until  Request to JoinYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​REFIND at SXSW 2025: Join us for an immersive experience blending fashion, technology, and community.​Step into the future of fashion and technology at our exclusive SXSW 2025 event, hosted by REFIND. This immersive experience invites you to explore the forefront of fashion through digital innovation and creative collaboration.​About REFIND: REFIND is a curated membership community and event platform at the intersection of fashion, innovation, and influence. Designed for industry professionals, brand owners, and creators, REFIND provides exclusive networking opportunities, brand collaborations, and resources. Through intimate events and strategic partnerships, we bridge the gap between emerging talent and established industry leaders. Our mission is to create a sustainable ecosystem where fashion and business intersect, empowering members with meaningful connections and tangible opportunities to grow.​About Our Co-Host: BeReworn is where communities meet sustainable fashion. We're passionate about IRL connections, bringing together people who are passionate about sustainability, fashion, and community to one platform. From event creation + management to discovering events, making new friends, and refreshing your wardrobe.​Event Schedule:​FEMALE FOUNDERS COFFEE & NETWORKING EVENT​10 AM-11:30 AM: (INVITE ONLY) Founders Breakfast: Apply to join us here. ​PANELS, POP-UPS, ACTIVATIONS, DEMOS, NETWORKING​12:00 PM - 6:30 PM​DOORS CLOSE FOR FASHION SHOW PREP​7:00 PM - 8:00 PM​FASHION SHOW DOORS OPEN​8:00 PM-11:00 PM​Event Highlights:​Engaging Panels: Delve into the future of fashion with insightful discussions on sustainability in fashion, strategic partnerships shaping the industry, and the evolution of fashion retail in a digital age.​Panelist to be announced!​​Interactive Activations and Demos: Immerse yourself in the latest fashion technology and brand experiences through interactive demonstrations that showcase cutting-edge innovations.​Tote: Digitize your wardrobe, share your style & shop with your friends.​Search Montage: Watch the show, shop the show. Discover and shop iconic on screen style with Search Montage​Plush Shopping: Tired of scrolling? Search in the language you speak in, from all the top brands at once. Powered by AI ✨​The Ryn App: Your AI Stylist​ThredX: We create virtual closets! ​Pop-Ups and Customization Experiences: Get hands-on with personalized fashion! Customize your own jewelry, boot corsets, charm bar and so much more.​Networking Opportunities: Connect with industry leaders, influencers, and fellow fashion enthusiasts. Build relationships and explore new opportunities in an energetic and inspiring environment.​High-Energy Fashion Show: Experience the creativity of our featured designers firsthand. Our runway show will highlight visionary collections, complemented by a live musical performance that promises to elevate the evening.​Why Attend:​Whether you're a fashion aficionado, tech enthusiast, entrepreneur, or simply curious about the future of fashion, join us at SXSW for a dynamic event that celebrates innovation, creativity, and community. Be part of shaping the future of fashion at the intersection of technology and culture.​Tickets:​Limited availability. Reserve your spot now to secure your place at this exclusive event at SXSW.​Join us for an unforgettable celebration of the Future of Fashion at SXSW!​Special activations by Mix'd Fashion:​Build Your Own Boot Top Bar​Customers drop off their boots at the event, and must be in good condition. ​Boots will be cut live at the table.​Customers fill out a form with basic measurements and customization details.​Boot tops will be sewn after the event with a 3-4 week turnaround.​Customers will receive order updates and tracking through Shopify.​Customers have 3 days after receiving their order to request a refit if needed.​Tops starting at $125​Mother Earth Beads:​Guests will have the opportunity to design their own bespoke pieces using premium gemstones like pearls, aquamarine, citrine, quartz, and more! This hands-on experience offers a unique way to accessorize with one-of-a-kind, handcrafted jewelry that reflects personal style. LocationMira Mira Venue2505-A E 6th St, Austin, TX 78702, USAHosted ByREFIND400 GoingDavies Odu, Amanda Crawford and 398 othersContact the HostReport EventArts & CultureWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

content: Explore EventsSign InPresented bySatoshiO's CerealSubscribeThe breakfast of BitcoinersHosted BySam CrumptonSkye Mercury1 GoingMo SContact the HostReport EventCryptoWellnessFeatured in SXSW🥣⚡🧇  Official Unofficial SatoshiO's xSW Breakfast PartySatoshiO's CerealRegister to See AddressAustin, TexasGet TicketsWelcome! Please choose your desired ticket type:Standard​Require Approval VIP​Require Approval Request to JoinYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​Official Unofficial SatoshiO's x Sweet Waffles Healthy Breakfast Party.What do you get?What you get:- healthy cereal - many flavors (even secret unrevealed flavors)- waffles- chicken and waffles - how a business can accept and use Bitcoin- how a business can build a Bitcoin treasury - art- wellness via by ATX's best- access to SatoshiO's Inner Circle "Breakfast Table / Cap Table Newsletter."Austin is home to:- Health & Wellness- Bitcoin - Consumer Packaged Goods (snacks n such)SatoshiO's Cereal is at the nexus of all three.It's just cereal.On bitcoin.Early Bird Discount code: 50% offSatoshiOsTickets paid on Lightning and Bitcoin receive a discount.Who is this for:- People who want to be healthy- Individuals who have an interest in Bitcoin but are weary of the website or wallet getting hacked.- Business that want to accept, transact, and store Bitcoin in their treasury such as lawyers, bankers, and family offices interested in how a consumer businesses like SatoshiO's can be built on top of Bitcoin's technology stack of fintech, compute, and energy.None of this is financial advice, nor health advice.It is a box of cereal (technically it's just a box of artwork and there will be cereal 🌾 and gluten free options as well)*Bitcoin is produced from >51% renewable energy and fits SatoshiO's brand vision of solving the energy crisis and modern food famine.LocationPlease register to see the exact location of this event.Austin, TexasPresented bySatoshiO's CerealSubscribeThe breakfast of BitcoinersHosted BySam CrumptonSkye Mercury1 GoingMo SContact the HostReport EventCryptoWellnessWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

name: #ReverseSugarDaddy
content: Explore EventsSign InHosted ByLarry Chiang8 Goingalex cheng, Jacky and 6 othersContact the HostReport EventFeatured in SXSW#ReverseSugarDaddyHosted by Larry ChiangFairmont Spa AustinAustin, TexasRegistrationApproval RequiredYour registration is subject to approval by the host.Welcome! To join the event, please register below. Request to JoinYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​Yes it’s funny and like our YouTube standup comedy that’s 105% serious, this is not my first multibillion dollar joke franchises. ​My sxsw visitors to Texas, you see there are two thousand jagged edges and sides to the sugar molecule c6H12o6. VCs like my flagship Reverse VC sponsor, Mark Suster think there are two sides to an equation  ​Getting money is a dirty business model. Paying money is reverse sugar daddy. Paying senior executives money to be your #ReverseSugarDaddy is true female empowerment. What this party strives to accomplish ​✅ Laugh together at a DrizzleDrizzle party​✅ Business models can be engineered towards our favor via, “Gender reversal, VC exercises“​✅ Parties can activate knowledge​✅ Similar to reverse VC pitch is the reverse sugar daddy pitch​✅ Ladies at SXSW, Have you ever paid for it? IT being A seasoned executive whom you pay​✅ Recruiting, compensating and rewarding, seasoned executives Is A business model, we will practice as females​We all have a friend of a friend who does only fans, perhaps at this year‘s 2025 SXSW, we will be the friend who reverses the sugar daddy equation. Let us not scoff at #DrizzleDrizzle. Let us start paying men 7 to 12 units of money, after they make us 20 to 50 units of money​If this is your first arbitrage, you’re welcome​I’m Larry Chiang and over Instagram and X is a tidal wave of proof I’m batting 1.000 when it comes to female billionaires ​Also, on YouTube, there will be a video series where outstanding female entrepreneurs rising will be featured from March 16, 2025 until March 13, 2026LocationFairmont Spa Austin101 Red River St, Austin, TX 78701, USAHosted ByLarry Chiang8 Goingalex cheng, Jacky and 6 othersContact the HostReport EventWhat's NewDiscoverPricingHelpHost your event with Luma ↗

content:

 Includes:

•  Guest list of attendees from the event.

•  Added to the investor database, which is regularly reviewed by investors.Get TicketYou will be asked to verify token ownership with your wallet.About Event​Hi there!​🚀 Dear Participants! Join our event in Austin – the hub of startup industry innovation!​Feel the excitement of our events. An event where innovative startups and entrepreneurs from around the world in Tech & Business meet with Silicon Valley investors. Seize your chance to dive into the world of business, technology, and venture capital.​💡 Why You Can't-Miss It:​Engage with leading experts and founders in the Tech & Business, and top investors to gain deep insights and valuable networking.​This event is a must-attend for those looking to gain ideas, experience, and valuable connections.​📈 Present Your Startup in the Tech & Business:​Showcase your startup in the Tech & Business! Email your pitch deck to contact.us@startupvalley.club and seize the opportunity to impress both the audience and investors!​Also, you need to fill out the application to participate as a pitcher/speaker at the event.​💼 We Welcome New Investors:​We invite investors to our event to expand their network, get acquainted with new startups, evaluate them, provide their feedback, participate in discussions, and gain access to a database of new and promising startups from around the world.​If you'd like access to a database of promising startup projects and additional benefits from Startup Valley, please fill out this application, and our team will contact you: this link​🎤Startup Presentations in the Tech & Business and Expert Evaluations:​Startups from various industries, prepare for your moment of glory with a 5-minute presentation scheduled for 07:40 PM, followed by invaluable feedback from our panel of venture capitalists and angel investors.​​The startup that is deemed "Most Investment-Worthy" will receive special recognition on our social media channels and will be featured in a newsletter for our investor base for consideration. 🏆​Who will you meet at the event:​Founders​Investors or VC companies​Marketers, Salespeople, Business Advisers​Game changers​AI Experts​Entrepreneurs from Europe, Asia, and the United Kingdom​Requirements to attendants:​Neat appearance​Good mood​1 drink bought at the bar (non-alcohol works too)​🤝The venue where we host our events is our partner. To continue hosting events at this location, please consider purchasing 1-2 drinks at the bar. Thank you.​Time:​Event time: 6:00 -9:00 PM​Pitch time: 7:40 -8:20 PM​🎟Join our event, and secure your ticket today!✨​Sincerely,​Startup Valley TeamLocationPlease register to see the exact location of this event.Austin, TexasPresented byStartup ValleySubscribeDriving innovation through Startup Events & Networking.
